ValidationRule.description: Restrict specific groups from sending emails to one of the blacklisted email addresses.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "Business User", $Profile.Name = "Vendor" ), Incoming = false, OR( CONTAINS(LOWER(ToAddress), 'care@sas.'), CONTAINS(LOWER(ToAddress), 'scan@sas.'), CONTAINS(LOWER(BccAddress), 'care@sas.'), CONTAINS(LOWER(BccAddress), 'care@sas.'), CONTAINS(LOWER(ToAddress), 'iwona.czerwinska@sas.dk'), CONTAINS(LOWER(BccAddress), 'iwona.czerwinska@sas.dk'), CONTAINS(LOWER(ToAddress), 'ap.pl@sas.dk'), CONTAINS(LOWER(BccAddress), 'ap.pl@sas.dk') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please modify to email adress before sending the email
